009package Ch17_EdgePreservingSmoothing;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
013
014import ij.ImagePlus;
015import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.KuwaharaF.Parameters;
020import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.KuwaharaFilterScalar;
021import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.KuwaharaFilterVector;
022
023/**
024 * Scalar version. Applied to color images, each color component is filtered separately.
025 * This plugin demonstrates the use of the Kuwahara filter, similar to the filter suggested in 
026 * Tomita and Tsuji (1977). It structures the filter region into  five overlapping, 
027 * square subregions of size (r+1) x (r+1). Unlike the original Kuwahara filter,
028 * it includes a centered subregion. This plugin works for all types of images and stacks.
029 * 
030 * @author WB
031 * @version 2022/03/30
032 */
033public class Kuwahara_Filter implements PlugInFilter {
034
035        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
036        private static boolean UseVectorFilter = false;
037        
038        private boolean isColor;
039
040        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
041                return DOES_ALL + DOES_STACKS;
042        }
043
044        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
045                isColor = (ip instanceof ColorProcessor);
046                if (!getParameters())
047                        return;
048                if (isColor && UseVectorFilter) {
049                        new KuwaharaFilterVector(params).applyTo((ColorProcessor)ip);
050                }
051                else {
052                        new KuwaharaFilterScalar(params).applyTo(ip);
053                }
054        }
055
056        private boolean getParameters() {
057                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
058                addToDialog(params, gd);
059                if (isColor)
060                        gd.addCheckbox("Use vector filter (color only)", UseVectorFilter);
061                
062                gd.showDialog();
063                if(gd.wasCanceled()) 
064                        return false;
065                
066                getFromDialog(params, gd);
067                if (isColor)
068                        UseVectorFilter = gd.getNextBoolean();
069                
070                params.radius = Math.max(params.radius, 1);
071                params.tsigma = Math.max(params.tsigma, 0);
072                return params.validate();
073        }
074}
075
